works.description:
To:  Those in Charge Monitoring the GooGle  
Pages

Date:  30/06/2011


To Whom It May Concern,

As the Vice Chancellor for Financial and Administrative Affairs at the  
University of Sharjah in the United Arab Emirates, I am fully committed to  
ensuring the financial and administrative interests of the University as  
well as the interests of the government of Sharjah, which has entrusted in  
me its confidence. These financial and administrative responsibilities have  
at times been in conflict with the personal interests of some from among  
our staff and students who have set up on the global social media network,  
GooGle, a page entitled, “Hand in Hand for the Removal of the Financial  
Vice Chancellor at the University of Sharjah” in Arabic:

يدا بيد لإقالة مدير المالية في جامعة الشارقة

On this site, they raise various accusations against me and incite false  
rumors about me without any official or unofficial basis or documents, in  
addition to displaying a picture of me with an (X) through it, causing  
grave personal public injury to me and my reputation.

These actions have resulted in direct personal and blatant slander of my  
character, and insult and injury to my name without any formal or informal  
basis. Such actions on Google further violate the ethical and humanitarian  
principles and regulations followed by your reputable site. I would  
therefore like to request that the abovementioned picture of me be removed  
from these pages and that all of the content of the pages be deleted which,  
as I have mentioned, have caused and continue to cause injury and insult to  
me personally before my family and among my various broad official and  
social associates.

Thank you for your commitment to quality and adhering to the ethical rules  
and regulations which contribute to success.

Sincerely,



Dr. Mohammed Ismail Mohammed,
Vice Chancellor for Financial and Administrative Affairs

University of Sharjah
Sharjah – United Arab Emirates
